Description: Lamp. Originally double spouted, spots. Made of blue glazed pottery (buff).
Curator's comments: Cf. R. Mason & J. Tugwell, 'Fatimid Tall-Necked Lamps and Their Associates: A Typology', Journal of the American Research Center in Egypt 47 (2011) 335-53, esp. 346-52 (Group Two).
Acquisition notes: According to OA+ register, transferred to EA 1979.
